org.franca.core.franca

Interface FEventOnIf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FEventOnIfImpl

    public interface FEventOnIf
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
    A representation of the model object 'FEvent On If'. This class represents a communication event, which basically corresponds to a message on the interface. Exactly one of its properties should be set, all other should be zero.

    The following features are supported:

    • Call
    • Respond
    • Signal
    • Set
    • Update
    • Error

    See Also:
    FrancaPackage.getFEventOnIf()
